title: vanajAsana vinuta
sahitya:
vanajAsana vinuta nata varadAyaki shrI lalita


anupallavi

  kanakAdri nivAsini nanu kaTAkSincumu kAmAkSi
				(svara sAhityam)
tAmasamikanu salupa tagAdu vinumu kAmita phalamu losaguTaku samayamu 
purAri ripuniki varamulu birAna nosagitivi yanucu vini nE nI padamula goliciti


caraNam 1    kalAbharaNa kalAdhari sakalAgama sannuta amba kaluSArti 
bhaya vibhanjani ilalOpala nI valanE galadA shrI lalitAmbilkE
    caraNam 2    parAku salupa rAdikanu parA vinu ninnuvinA parulevvaru 
nannu brOcuTaku karudA karuNAkari shrIkari ninnE nera nammiti
    caraNam 3    sadA dalacina dAsulakunu dAsuDa shankari madanAri sati 
kumAruni muda sampada kAspadamai nadiga nI pada padmamu
